item.title: Apple PUT Vertical
item.description: The market has been dropping brutally over the last couple of weeks. It looks like it has come to a support level. Below is a chart of Apple (AAPL), which is a proxie for the broader market. It looks like the market could go up or go sideways. To take advantage of this situation I will sell a 29 July PUT Vertical. SELL -1 VERTICAL AAPL 100 (Weeklys) 29 JUL 22 130/120 PUT @3.
